p.s: The article Hope of escape lost in translation written by Zia Haider Rahman and published in The Sunday Times on the 17th December 2016, thematizes the barriers of language in migration to Britain, the consequences, his personal experience and personal opinion on this topic.
Firstly he says a huge amount of money is wasted on translating language, but a bigger problem is the britishBritish residents thinking they do not have to learn englishEnglish.
After this, he speaks about the current problems the Bangladeshi community has to face because they are not willing to move away from their native-language.
Next he mentions his personal experience and how his parents and his school helped him with learning englishEnglish when they immigrated there.
The article ends with him criticising the current state and presenting his solutions.
In the end, this article gives a very subjective education but portrays the problems well.
